content.raw_text: From: Amazon Prime Video primevideo-noreply@amazon.com To: sarah.j.miller92@gmail.com Subject: Welcome to Amazon Prime Video – Start Streaming Now! Date: Fri, 20 Jun 2025 02:18:00 +0530 (IST) Body: Dear Sarah Miller, Welcome to Amazon Prime Video! Your subscription is now active, and you’re ready to dive into a world of entertainment. With Prime Video, you get unlimited access to exclusive Amazon Originals, popular movies, hit TV shows, and live sports—all included with your Amazon Prime membership or standalone Prime Video subscription. Here’s what you can enjoy: • Exclusive Content: Stream award-winning series like The Boys, The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power, and more. • Live Events: Catch live sports like NFL on Prime or NWSL games. • Add-On Channels: Enhance your experience with subscriptions to HBO Max, STARZ, and more. Explore channels at amazon.com/channels. • Offline Viewing: Download select titles to watch on the go with the Prime Video app. Your subscription details: • Plan: Amazon Prime Video (included with Amazon Prime) • Billing Date: Monthly on the 20th ($14.99/month for Prime or $8.99/month for standalone Prime Video, plus applicable taxes) • Payment Method: Visa ending in 5678 Get started now: Start Watching To manage your subscription or update your preferences, visit Your Account. Thank you for choosing Amazon Prime Video! If you have any questions, contact us at support@amazon.com or call 1-888-280-4331. Happy streaming, The Amazon Prime Video Team Amazon.com | Privacy Notice | Conditions of Use © 1996-2025, Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates

ner_entities.label: SUBSCRIPTION_TYPE
ner_entities.value: Amazon Prime Video (included with Amazon Prime)

content.raw_text: From: Amazon Prime Video auto-confirm@amazon.com To: rajesh.kumar1985@outlook.com Subject: Your Amazon Prime Video Subscription Renews Soon Date: Sun, 15 Jun 2025 02:18:00 +0530 (IST) Body: Dear Rajesh Kumar, This is a friendly reminder that your Amazon Prime Video subscription is set to renew on June 20, 2025. You’ll continue to enjoy unlimited access to thousands of movies, TV shows, and exclusive Amazon Originals. Subscription details: • Plan: Amazon Prime Video (standalone) • Renewal Date: June 20, 2025 • Amount: $8.99/month (plus applicable taxes) • Payment Method: Mastercard ending in 9012 No action is needed to continue your subscription—it will renew automatically. To update your payment method or manage your subscription, visit Your Account. Want to explore more? Check out new releases and add-on channels at amazon.com/channels. If you have any questions, reach out to us at support@amazon.com or call 1-888-280-4331. Enjoy your Prime Video experience! The Amazon Prime Video Team Amazon.com | Privacy Notice | Conditions of Use © 1996-2025, Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates

From: Amazon Prime Video no-reply@primevideo.com To: emily.r.watson@mycompanydomain.com Subject: Action Required: Issue with Your Prime Video Payment Date: Sat, 21 Jun 2025 02:18:00 +0530 (IST) Body: Dear Emily Watson, We’re having trouble processing the payment for your Amazon Prime Video subscription. To keep your account active and continue enjoying uninterrupted streaming, please update your payment information. Subscription details: • Plan: Amazon Prime Video (standalone) • Amount Due: $8.99 (plus applicable taxes) • Payment Method: Visa ending in 3456 (payment declined) Please take a moment to update your payment details: Update Payment Method If the payment issue isn’t resolved by June 25, 2025, your subscription may be paused, and you could lose access to Prime Video content. For assistance, contact us at support@amazon.com or call 1-888-280-4331. Thank you, The Amazon Prime Video Team Amazon.com | Privacy Notice | Conditions of Use © 1996-2025, Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates Note: If you suspect this email is not from Amazon, verify it in your Message Center on Amazon.com. Report suspicious emails to stop-spoofing@amazon.com.

From: Amazon Prime Video notifications@amazonaws.com To: john.t.smith2000@yahoo.com Subject: Your Amazon Prime Video Subscription Has Been Canceled Date: Fri, 20 Jun 2025 02:18:00 +0530 (IST) Body: Dear John Smith, We’re sorry to see you go. This email confirms that your Amazon Prime Video subscription has been canceled, effective June 20, 2025. You will not be charged further, and your access to Prime Video content will end on June 20, 2025. Subscription details: • Plan: Amazon Prime Video (standalone) • Cancellation Date: June 20, 2025 • Final Billing: No further charges If you change your mind, you can restart your subscription at any time by visiting amazon.com/primevideo and signing up again. We’d love to hear your feedback to improve our service. Please contact us at support@amazon.com or call 1-888-280-4331 if you have any questions or would like to share your thoughts. Thank you for being a Prime Video member. The Amazon Prime Video Team Amazon.com | Privacy Notice | Conditions of Use © 1996-2025, Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates
